SavedLv1_00:

Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:SurpriseM>Not good! Very not good!<sp:5:0:0> This thing's
out for blood!

Hitting it head-on is NOT an option, that's
for sure. So what's the play? <sp:5:0:0>Well, I'll let

Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0100>I know it's not much, but please take this.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>My thanks! That enemy wasn't quite as

SavedLv2_00: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>Thanks! I was in trouble back there.
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease>Thanks for helping me get away safely!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for your help! I wasn't sure which
way that fight would go...
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Thanks for helping out! <sp:5:1:0>I really need it!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you. If you hadn't come when
you did, my life might have been cut
tragically short...
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>That did not go well...<sp:5:0:0> I'm just glad that

Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>I'm sorry you had to see me like that.<sp:5:0:0>
